comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: William Starling Burgess (1878-1947) was a naval architect and aviation pioneer: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Starling_Burgess He married five times; but this wife would likely be artist Rosamund Tudor Burgess (1878-1949), mother of their three children born 1905, 1907, and 1915. Their older son Edward died at age 5 in 1910, by falling off a boat. Their daughter Starling Burgess used the name Tasha Tudor and became an illustrator.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Tasha Tudor (1915-2008) was famous -- a talented illustrator, whose old-timey scenes decorated calendars, greeting cards, and children's books. When she died at age 92, she left an estate worth about two million dollars. A Tasha Tudor images sampler: www.google.com/images?q=tasha+tudor&rls=com.microsoft... Wikipedia on Tasha Tudor: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tasha_Tudor

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca:

Thanks for the information. It does seem that this would be Rosamund, so we will add her maiden name to the record as well when we update.
